abstract: Russian billionaires who own the TNK-BP oil venture with BP are prepared to buy the latter’s 50 percent stake to end a struggle for control, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Russian billionaires who own the TNK-BP oil venture with BP are prepared to buy the latter’s 50 percent stake to end a struggle for control, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Russian Billionaires Said to Plan Buyout of BP’s Russian Joint-Venture
